===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[disobey]]; to [[defy]]
# to [[try]] to one's [[utmost]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|狠|[[cruel]]; [[savage]]; [[inhumane]]}}
# {{†}} [[struggle]]; [[dispute]]
# [[very]]; [[rather]]; [[quite]]
#: {{zh-x|他 很 高興。|He is '''very''' happy.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 很 喜歡。|I like it '''very much'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 喜歡 得{de} 很。|I like it '''very much'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|when linking a noun and an adjective}} to [[be]]
#: {{zh-x|我 很 餓。|I am '''hungry'''.}}

====Usage notes====
* In Chinese, {{zh-l|是}} cannot be used to mean ''to be'' if it is followed by an adjective. In those case, {{lang|zh|是}} is replaced by {{zh-l|很}}. Depending on the context, it will be translated to ''is very'' or simply to ''to be''.
*: {{zh-x|他 很 高興。|He is (very) happy.}}
